portfolio.title: Books Store
portfolio.description: Build real world e-commerce application using ASP.NET Core MVC, Entity Framework Core and ASP.NET Core Identity.

portfolio.title: Gamers Dream
portfolio.description: Developed a responsive React app using TypeScript, reusable components, CSS styling, form validation, backend integration, deployment, and clean coding practices.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce Ski Products
portfolio.description: Developed a feature-rich e-commerce platform using ASP.NET and Angular, styled with Tailwind CSS. Utilized Docker for containerization, integrated real-time updates with SignalR, deployed the application on Azure, and implemented secure payment processing with Stripe.

testimonial.description: Working with Ashour was an absolute pleasure! They built a sleek and user-friendly website for my business that exceeded my expectations. The attention to detail and responsiveness throughout the process were incredible. I highly recommend his services!

Ashour developed a custom e-commerce platform for our store, complete with real-time updates and seamless payment integration. Their technical expertise and ability to communicate complex ideas clearly made the project smooth and stress-free. We couldn’t be happier with the results!

I hired Ashour to create a web app for my startup, and they delivered a top-notch product on time. The combination of professionalism, creativity, and technical skill he brought to the project was outstanding. They’re a fantastic developer!
